ohha.puzzlecrafter.puzzles

Class Sudoku

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohha.puzzlecrafter.puzzles.Puzzle
      • ohha.puzzlecrafter.puzzles.Sudoku

  • public class Sudoku
extends Puzzle
    Implements the Sudoku puzzle style. Solver performance is satisfactory at least on 6 by 6 sudokus.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sudoku

        public Sudoku(int size,
              Partition partition)
        Constructs a new empty Sudoku of the given height and width, with the given partition. The Partition supplied must be a valid partition, but this is not enforced by this constructor. See the Partition class for methods for enforcing it.
        Parameters:
        size - the height and width of the grid in cells
        partition - the partition to use

      • Sudoku

        public Sudoku(int size,
              int regionHeight,
              int regionWidth)
        Constructs a new empty Sudoku of the given height and width, with the partition consisting of equal-sized rectangular regions of the given height and width. The rectangular Region parameters must define a valid partition, but this is not enforced by this constructor.
        Parameters:
        size - the height and width of the grid in cells
        regionHeight - the height of a region in cells
        regionWidth - the width of a region in cells

    • Method Detail

      • isPartialSolution

        public boolean isPartialSolution(CellCoordinate cell)
        Description copied from class: Puzzle
        Returns true if the current state of the puzzle is possible to be completed into a full solution, that is the state of the puzzle is not in contradiction with the puzzle's rules. This method must be implemented case by case in each puzzle.

        The passed parameter is the coordinate of the cell where the solver last filled a value, as it is most often sufficient to check that the rules of the puzzle still hold only around the cell that changed.

        Specified by:
        isPartialSolution in class Puzzle
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell last modified by the solver
        Returns:
        true if the puzzle may be completed into a valid solution, false otherwise

      • deepCopy

        public Sudoku deepCopy()
        Description copied from class: Puzzle
        Returns a deep copy of the puzzle. This method allows the solving algorithm to copy the solved puzzle into a list of solutions, and then further mutate the puzzle object it is solving.

        It must be implemented by each concrete puzzle implementation so that it captures all the additional structures each puzzle might have, and that the puzzle object has the correct subclass. Regrettably this seems to result in a lot of copied code.

        Specified by:
        deepCopy in class Puzzle
        Returns:
        a deep copy of the puzzle
